feed.title: Capital Efficient Honeypots w/ "Scorched Earth" Doublespending Protection

entry.title: Capital Efficient Honeypots w/ "Scorched Earth" Doublespending Protection
entry.summary: In an email exchange, Jimmy asked Peter Todd if his idea of a Bitcoin honeypot was related to the Bitcoin Vigil program published in 2014. Todd clarified that the idea of a Bitcoin honeypot was not originally his and was likely related to the Bitcoin Vigil program. He also expressed interest in giving credit to anyone who had previously invented the techniques he and Jeff Coleman used for the Bitcoin honeypot.
